properties.name: features.persistentRooms.enabled
properties.description: Toggle to enable persistence of rooms using the database. When false, the app uses a No-Op adapter and does not access the DB.

properties.name: app.websocket.path
properties.description: WebSocket endpoint path (must match WebSocketConfig mapping).

properties.name: app.websocket.allowed-origins
properties.description: Comma-separated list of allowed WebSocket origins (e.g. https://ep.noxvobsicum.at,http://localhost:8080).

properties.name: app.websocket.debug-open
properties.description: If true, allow all origins for WebSocket during local debugging (do not enable in production).
